events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to return it for a full refund as soon as possible.
Customer issue has been categorized under refund due to request for money back for incorrect item.
Support agent Jessica has been assigned to handle this refund request case for the customer.
Hello! I’m Jessica, I’m here to help you with your refund request regarding the incorrect item delivery.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I've attached a photo showing the wrong item that was delivered.
Thank you for the information. We will arrange a return shipment for the incorrect item and issue a full refund within 5 business days.
That sounds good to me, thank you for the quick response and assistance with the refund process.
We have confirmed the refund process is initiated and an email confirmation has been sent to you. The case will be closed once refund is complete.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund. Please contact us if there are any further issues or questions.
Since the refund has been successfully processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
A short satisfaction survey has been sent to your email to gather feedback on your support experience today.
